body.p:
Frankfort Ky Feb 1st 1865
To his Excellency Thomas E Bramblett Govener of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

The undersigned would respectfully ask the exercise of your Clemency in behalf of one of the inmates of the state prison, at the september term of the Kenton Circuit court for Kenton County held in the year 1864 Ellen Beatie was convicted of Larceny and sentenced to one years confinement at hard labor in the penetentiay she has served almost 5 Months of said Sentence and Capt Todd the warden informs us that she her conduct has been good and with a view and desire to enable her to reform and return to usefullness as she Seems penitent and promises reform we hope our application will meet your approbation

most respectfully
A H Herod
E. T. Clarkson
George A. Yates

Kenton Cir Ct
vs
Ellen Beatie
Pardon --
2nd Feby/65
